Package org.yamcs.parameter

Class SystemParametersProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
      • org.yamcs.parameter.SystemParametersProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, ParameterProvider, ProcessorService, YamcsService, StreamSubscriber
    @Deprecated
public class SystemParametersProvider
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractService
implements StreamSubscriber, ParameterProvider
    Deprecated.
    Provides system variables from the sys_var stream to ParameterRequestManager It also provides some info about the current processor For the moment all variables starting with "/yamcs" are accepted and nothing else. Aliases are not supported.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

      • getSystemParameter

        public SystemParameter getSystemParameter​(String fqname)
        Deprecated.
        Get (and possibly create) system parameter. The parameter may be in the XtceDB in case it is referred to by an algorithm. Otherwise is created on the fly and not added to XtceDB.
        Parameters:
        fqname - - the fully qualified name of the parameter to be returned
        Returns:
        the system parameter having the fqname.
